duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technology leadership to improve business process workflow efficiencies and application solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze business processes, gather requirements, and design optimal solutions.
Design new technology solutions, optimize existing ones, and provide technical support and guidance to project teams and stakeholders.
Develop integration strategies leveraging the latest technological advancements in ERP space.
Obtain approval and sign-off on the solution design from relevant stakeholders.
Oversee the implementation of JDE and other third-party solutions, ensuring adherence to the agreed-upon solution design, project timeline, and budget.
Serve as the primary point of contact for all technical aspects of JDE projects, offering guidance, expertise, and support to project teams and stakeholders.
Regularly assess the performance of implemented solutions, identifying opportunities for improvement and working with stakeholders to prioritize and implement enhancements.
Understand ERP data structures to support the implementation of data integrations between multiple systems.
Provide application support, troubleshooting, and training to the end user community.
Oversight of outside consultants to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Participate in the Business Systems team’s 'on-call' rotation to support the business during and outside of normal business hours.
Minor travel to support project implementation when needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree required. MBA / MCIS preferred.
